mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, dueDate, regDate from tbl_board where delflag != 'Y' order by bno desc limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, modDate = now(), where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: update tbl_board set delflag = 'Y' where bno = #{bno}
